name: Fun+Art+Fun Gift Certificates
description:
Fun+Art+Fun Gift Certificates

Fun+Art+Fun gift certificates make great gifts for birthdays, holidays, graduations, and many other occasions.

Gift certificates are eligible for studio workshop reservations. Subject to availability, the gift certificate can be used for any combination of reservations at one workshop or multiple workshops. Directions for redeeming are included with the gift certificate.

Choose eGift Certificate options to have your gift certificate emailed to your recipient. Choose the Paper Gift Certificate option to have your gift certificate mailed with a greeting card to your recipient. Please include email or mailing address and message in the "Notes to Seller" area when checking out. Please allow 7 business days for delivery.

Refund Policy: Fun+Art+Fun gift certificates are non-refundable, but can be used toward other Fun+Art+Fun events.
